story_09_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Wow, that was so cool! Team battling really is
a whole different experience!
story_09_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I wish I could do it more...
story_09_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Do you think it
would be OK if I join your team?
story_09_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
With Iris on our team now, I’m even more
excited about what’s to come!
story_09_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Me too! Let’s all do our best, team!
So...what’s next?
story_09_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Wanna head back to the city for now?
Let’s go search for another PML Leader
and earn our next badge!
